name: Find & Destroy: Tank Strategy
description: Hardcore turn based tank combat (PVP), mixed with battle arena (MOBA) elements.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia 8600GT, ATI Radeon 2400, Intel HD4000 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 400 MB available space Sound Card: Recommended
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia 560 GTX, ATI Radeon HD 6870 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 400 MB available space Sound Card: Recommended
